{"id":"1884","currency_code":"CAD","title":"Smoother Straightening Balm 250 ml","handle":"","url":"https://beautyroute.com/smoother-straightening-balm-250-ml","description":"

1. PRODUCT INFO :

L'ANZA Healing Smooth Smoother Straightening Balm adds shine while encouraging a smooth, naturally straight look.

2. FOR WHOM / USE :

Lightweight and greaseless formula provides naturally straight look

3. FOR WHAT / BENEFITS :

● Maintains healthy moisture 

● Calms unruly curls and waves 

● Blocks out humidity and prevents frizz

● Provides thermal protection from heat styling

4. ABOUT THE COLLECTION :

According to the Professional Beauty Association, 84% of women want more shine, while 62% want less frizz.L’ANZA Healing Smooth delivers both highly desired benefits. It contains the extraordinary Coix Sleek Complex that calms curls and waves without the use of chemical straighteners or relaxers. In addition, the Keratin Healing System effectively blocks out humidity, a major cause of frizz. Together, these ingredients leave hair incredibly soft and smooth with radiant shine.
